languages.text: "Какой позор..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью, и исходящая от нее ярость стискивает ваше сердце.{/n} "Все эти годы Дом Орселлио строил свое величие на лжи и предательстве... Не только собственного рода, но и Империума!"

traits.locale_text: "Какой позор..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью, и исходящая от нее ярость стискивает ваше сердце.{/n} "Все эти годы Дом Орселлио строил свое величие на лжи и предательстве... Не только собственного рода, но и Империума!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"
languages.original_text: "Какой позор..." {n}Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью, и исходящая от нее ярость стискивает ваше сердце.{/n} "Все эти годы Дом Орселлио строил свое величие на лжи и предательстве... Не только собственного рода, но и Империума!"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「なんという屈辱…」{n}カシアが両目を覆うと、あなたの心が彼女の怒りに支配されるのを感じる。{/n}「これまでのオーセリオ家の栄光が、一族と帝国そのものに嘘と裏切りを重ねた上に築かれていたなんて！」
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんという屈辱…」{n}カシアが両目を覆うと、あなたの心が彼女の怒りに支配されるのを感じる。{/n}「これまでのオーセリオ家の栄光が、一族と帝国そのものに嘘と裏切りを重ねた上に築かれていたなんて！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “何等耻辱……”{n}卡西娅捂住了眼睛，你感觉她的怒火攫住了你的心。{/n}“一直以来，奥赛罗家族的辉煌都建立在谎言之上！奥赛罗家族早就背叛了自己的血脉，背叛了帝国！”
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: “何等耻辱……”{n}卡西娅捂住了眼睛，你感觉她的怒火攫住了你的心。{/n}“一直以来，奥塞罗家族的辉煌都建立在谎言之上！奥塞罗家族早就背叛了自己的血脉，背叛了帝国！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quelle disgrâce... » {n}Cassia se couvre les yeux, et vous sentez sa fureur vous enserrer le cœur.{/n} « Trahir son propre sang et l'Imperium même... La grandeur de la maison Orsellio a été bâtie sur un ramassis de mensonges ! »
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle disgrâce... » {n}Cassia se couvre les yeux, et vous sentez sa fureur vous enserrer le cœur.{/n} « Trahir son propre sang et l'Imperium même... La grandeur de la maison Orsellio a été bâtie sur un ramassis de mensonges ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Qué desgracia...». {n}Cassia se cubre los ojos, y sientes que su rabia atenaza tu corazón.{/n} «¡Durante todo este tiempo, la grandeza de la casa Orsellio se ha construido con mentiras y traiciones a su sangre y al mismísimo Imperium!».
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: «Qué desgracia...». {n}Cassia se cubre los ojos, y sientes que su rabia atenaza tu corazón.{/n} «¡Durante todo este tiempo, la grandeza de la casa Orsellio se ha construido con mentiras y traiciones a su sangre y al mismísimo Imperium!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Welch eine Schande ..." {n}Cassia bedeckt ihre Augen, und du spürst, wie dein Herz von ihrem Zorn ergriffen wird.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit über war die Erhabenheit von Haus Orsellio auf Lügen aufgebaut, auf dem Verrat am eigenen Blut und am Imperium!"
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Welch eine Schande ..." {n}Cassia bedeckt ihre Augen, und du spürst, wie dein Herz von ihrem Zorn ergriffen wird.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit über war die Erhabenheit von Haus Orsellio auf Lügen aufgebaut, auf dem Verrat am eigenen Blut und am Imperium!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu nasıl bir rezalettir?" {n}Cassia, elleriyle gözlerini kapatıyor. Öfkesinin kendi yüreğini de sardığını hissediyorsun.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi'nin görkemi, en başından beri yalanlardan ve hem kendi kanına hem de İmparatorluk'a ihanetinden geliyormuş meğer!"
languages.original_text: "What disgrace..." {n}Cassia covers her eyes, and you feel your heart become gripped by her rage.{/n} "All this time, House Orsellio's grandeur has been built on lies and betrayal of its blood and the Imperium itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu nasıl bir rezalettir..." {n}Cassia, elleriyle gözlerini kapatıyor. Cassia'nın öfkesinin kendi kalbini de sardığını hissediyorsun.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi'nin görkemi, en başından beri yalanlardan ve hem kendi kanına hem de İmparatorluk'a ihanetinden geliyormuş meğer!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
